plot: The oldest daughter is responsible for her family while the mother is working overseas. While the mother is away, the father rapes the daughter.
title: Daughter: A Story of Incest
plot_es: The oldest daughter is responsible for her family while the mother is working overseas. While the mother is away, the father rapes the daughter.
plot_en: The oldest daughter is responsible for her family while the mother is working overseas. While the mother is away, the father rapes the daughter.
